page.title: 07FARMING EQUIPMENT. WILLEY.
page.content: The Old Hall, The Red House & Lower House are mixed farms owned by branches of one family which covers 384acres, 20 acres of which is cereal or root crop. Old Hall has diesel generating plant for lighting, a catch pit for water which supplies the house by gravitation. The family maintain the land with intermittent help from younger family members and these mechanical aids; 7 tractors, 1 combine harvester, 1 single & 2 triple furrow ploughs, 2 chain & spike harrows, 2 muck spreaders, 1 thistle cutter, 1 mowing machine, 1 drum mower, 1 hay tedder, 2 manure drills, 2 precision drills for turnips, 1 turnip cup drill, 3 link boxes, 1 threshing machine, 1 hedge trimmer, 1 acrobat cultivator scuffle.
